text: During my last project, I collaborated with a team of 5 engineers to design a scalable microservices architecture. I often facilitated communication between backend and frontend teams, resolving blockers and ensuring deadlines were met. I enjoy brainstorming solutions to complex problems and mentoring junior members.

I led a data migration project where I had to troubleshoot multiple issues in the pipeline. I made sure to document every step and communicate progress regularly to stakeholders. I thrive in problem-solving tasks and like to work in close collaboration with my teammates.
